original_text: The Lord replied, “Go down and bring Aaron up with you. But the priests and the people must not force their way through to come up to the Lord, or he will break out against them.”
korean_text: 여호와께서 그에게 이르시되 가라 너는 내려가서 아론과 함께 올라오고 제사장들과 백성에게는 경계를 넘어 나 여호와에게로 올라오지 못하게 하라 내가 그들을 칠까 하노라

sentences.original_text: and bring Aaron up with you
But the priests and the people must not force their way through
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 제사장들과 백성은 억지로 나아가지 말라

sentences.original_text: to come up to the Lord
or he will break out against them
